::Magmatron::

    He sent a comm out to Shredder and his group of Destrons=

l Message -----

hing.


  ::Shredder::

  Shredder looks at the Destron base in the distanc=
e. He opens his comm.

  "Magmatron, we're in sight of the Destron base. Ma=
y we enter?"




  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> =
wrote:
  > ::Magmatron::
  > 
  >     He noticed a powerful bots signature,=
 and amazingly it was 
  Destron. (Galvatron) He sent a comm encoded only t=
o the Destron 
  signal, nobody else could decode it, and if they did, it w=
ould come 
  out in gibbering incohearent words.
  >     The message went l=
ike this. "Attention all Destrons. Please 
  return to LV-426. We have impo=
rtant matters to discuss, they concern 
  the very fate of our faction in t=
hese Beast Wars."
  >     Magmatron had also recently awakened the sleeping=
 bot in the 
  lab. He sent a worker drone to the lab to do some testing...=
.
